topics.title: SigmaFi Introduction and Core Functionality
topics.summary: Introduction to SigmaFi as a peer-to-peer lending platform on Ergo blockchain. Explains how users can create loan requests with collateral and how lenders can fund these loans with transparent terms including APR and collateral requirements.

topics.title: Platform Interface and Risk Management
topics.summary: Demonstration of SigmaFi's dashboard showing active loan requests and the importance of understanding risks. Explains the difference between collateralized and under-collateralized loans and how borrower-created requests work with specific terms and timeframes.

topics.title: Automated Execution and Liquidation Process
topics.summary: Explains how SigmaFi operates as an autonomous vending machine with automatic loan execution and liquidation. Details the process where unpaid loans automatically liquidate collateral after the deadline to protect lenders.

topics.title: Market Dynamics and Leverage Strategy
topics.summary: Analyzes why borrowers pay high interest rates as a leverage strategy on ERG price appreciation. Explains the risk profiles for both borrowers and lenders, with borrowers betting on ERG price increases while lenders secure high APR returns.

topics.title: Real-World Applications and Platform Benefits
topics.summary: Discusses potential use cases for miners and comparison to traditional financial products like CDs. Emphasizes the low fees (around 1% vs traditional intermediaries) and encourages users to try the platform at sigmafy.app.
